Actions.Name: Enfeeble
Actions.Effects: Character must save or be pacified. Pacified characters take [D] again.

Actions.Name: Demonbrand
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 is branded.

Actions.Name: Howl of Terror
Actions.Effects: Increase range and damage by +1 for each time this ability was used this turn.

Actions.Name: Fear
Actions.Mark: While marked, that foe gains +1 curse on attacks and saves unless adjacent to an ally. If they end their turn adjacent to an ally, they can clear this mark.

Actions.Name: Demon Flay
Actions.Description: Target foe in range 4 takes [fray] damage. Summon a natal adjacent to them.

Actions.Name: Haste
Actions.Description: A demon in range 6 is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they gain +1 action and double their speed.
